items.title: iOS/iPadOS 15 Support
items.description: Shukofukurou now officially supports iOS/iPadOS 15 and takes advantage of new features from iOS/iPadOS 13 and 14

items.title: Hachidori Lite Extension
items.description: You can now update your lists based on what Anime you are watching from legal streaming services like Crunchyroll, Funimation, and Hidive in Safari on iOS/iPadOS 15.

items.title: Bug Fixes and Improvements
items.description: Various bug fixes and improvements are made from the previous release.
